title: Tender Management -Data Business Analyst
description:
Job Description

About BDP International:

PSA BDP, a member of the PSA Group, is a leading provider of globally integrated and port-centric supply chain, transportation, and logistics solutions. The company is headquartered in Philadelphia, PA, and employs more than 5,500 people worldwide.

We are a team that celebrates our unique diversity and close-knit community atmosphere. Our core values begin at the very top and span the broad reach of our global community.

We offer dynamic careers for those individuals looking to be a part of something bigger and provide unequivocal opportunities for growth within the organization.

PSA BDP serves over 5,000 customers, including some of the world's leading multinational companies within the chemical, retail & consumer, life sciences & pharmaceuticals, and electric vehicle & industrial verticals.

The Data Analyst is dedicated to supporting the TM team in data ETL tasks as well as business intelligence reporting. They use data science, statistics and DB normalization tools and resources to help TM maintain structure treatment and use of its data in order to minimize tasks, guarantee data availability and accuracy, and to ultimately impact the team’s success ratio and productivity.


Develop and maintain a ETL framework for TM using tools including MS Excel Power Query, Power PVT, etc.
Develop and maintain a business intelligence and reporting network using tools including MS Power BI
Create and maintain a structure repository of data
Support the TM team members in their everyday data needs


Explore, present, develop and implement innovative ideas to facilitate TM data processing, the team’s workflow, our productivity and our success ratio

Key competencies

Generic standards

Functional standards


Self-starter, flexible, accountable
Critical thinker
Keen to submerge in PSABDP’s domain
Effective communicator
Adept in complex and detailed work
Planning, coordination, and result oriented
Think and act as a project manager
Be a bridge between the world of data science and PSA BDP’s core domain
Manage stakeholders to get thing done
Strong multitasking skills and work prioritization skills
Precision in managing data


Job Requirements

Academic Qualifications:


General:
Proficient in English for professional communication purposes
A Bachelor’s degree in a relevant field such as:
Data Analytics
Business Administration
Computer Science
Mathematics/Statistics
Certifications in Microsoft tools are a plus, e.g.:
Microsoft Certified: Power BI Data Analyst Associate
Microsoft Office Specialist (MOS) Excel Expert
Additional Tools (nice-to-have):
SQL knowledge for data extraction and querying.
Knowledge of Python/R for advanced data manipulation.
At least 3 years of experience working in roles involving advanced Excel and Power BI, such as:
Data Analyst
Business Intelligence Specialist
Reporting Analyst
MIS (Management Information Systems) Analyst


Please visit our website: psabdp.com
